EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.2 week early bird deadline
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - There's still time to save
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Early-Bird Discount Extended To August 26 TriTech's Annual User Conference l September 26 - 28, 2012 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
Haven’t registered for TriCON 2012 yet? Act fast – you still have until August 26 to take advantage of the early-bird discount and hotel group rate.
Make your plans now to hear from TriTech's leadership team, clients, and subject matter experts to find out how our solutions are helping to "Break Barriers" and improve operations.
Don't miss insightful presentations from your peers at REMSA (NV), Bucks County (PA), Bexar County Sheriff's Office (TX), Cedar Park (TX) and more.
Click here <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriCON2012_Agenda_Public_08012012.pdf> for a link to the latest detailed agenda.
<http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriTech_JustificationLetter.doc> Conference Details
Registration: $695 - Early-bird discount before August 26.
Part of a group of 4 or more? Enter the discount code "Group" to receive an additional $50 discount.
<http://www.cvent.com/d/vcqlkf/4W>
Hotel: $199 per night - Hotel Group Rate cutoff August 26.
<http://www.hilton.com/en/hi/groups/personalized/S/SANCCHH-TTSS-20120924/index.jhtml?WT.mc_id=POG>
